name: Your Garden is Out of Control
name_original: Your Garden is Out of Control
description:
Your Garden is Out of Control is a simple point-and-click action game where you futilely attempt to tame a garden overrun with ravenous weeds. Created in 48 hours for Game Maker Toolkit's 2020 Game Jam "Out of Control". 

Features

  • Fast paced arcadey gameplay
  • Difficulty that increases over time
  • Three different weeds to chop
  • A single insane boss fight
  • On explosive power up
  • A garden that is truly out of control

How to Play

Click the mouse to chop with your shears. Chop the weeds growing out of the ground to earn points and chop Pesticide bombs to kill all weeds on screen. You lose if too many weeds take control of your garden.  

Credits

  • Art and programming by Taylor "vincinerated" Van Dommelen
  • Programming by Roy "sgtscum" Filipchuk
  • For GMTK Game Jam 2020
  • Royalty free music by Brave Warrior
